Articles.Content: I have learned now that 1.0.5 is NOT the most current version of the game. However, I can't find the 1.1.3 update anywhere! I got the game off of ksp.com. Please help this guy who lives under a rock update-wise.

@W. Kerman,if you purchased the game from store,there is link to it on top bar of this forum(Store).Go to store,login with your store account,go to "my account" and you'll get the possibility to download the latest game for your platform.
It's just like you purchased your fist copy,you can get all the updates from the same place.
The alternative would be to run "launcher.exe" from your KSP folder and then click update.It will download all necessary files and overwrite them.
I personally don't like the "launcher" option,simply because is little bugy,and in
some cases save braking.

14 minutes ago, sebi.zzr said:

... Go to store,login with your store account,go to "my account" and you'll get the possibility to download the latest game for your platform. ...

Correct.
But what ever you do do not use the launcher to update your game. It is not a little buggy, it is buggy as hell. The automatic update feature has not worked properly since the day it was introduced.

On a slightly different note: do NOT overwrite your KSP1.0.5! Instead create a new, separate install. You might regret overwriting 1.0.5. Not only the launcher is buggy as hell. Any KSP past 1.0.5 is too.
